item.title: seo - 2014-05-24 04:53:51
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Hello Web Admin, I noticed that your On-Page SEO is is missing a few factors, for one you do not use all three H tags in your post, also I notice that you are not using bold or italics properly in your SEO optimization. On-Page SEO means more now than ever since the new Google update: Panda. No longer are backlinks and simply pinging or sending out a RSS feed the key to getting Google PageRank or Alexa Rankings, You now NEED On-Page SEO. So what is good On-Page SEO?First your keyword must appear in the title.Then it must appear in the URL.You have to optimize your keyword and make sure that it has a nice keyword density of 3-5% in your article with relevant LSI (Latent Semantic Indexing). Then you should spread all H1,H2,H3 tags in your article.Your Keyword should appear in your first paragraph and in the last sentence of the page. You should have relevant usage of Bold and italics of your keyword.There should be one internal link to a page on your blog and you should have one image with an alt tag that has your keyword....wait there's even more Now what if i told you there was a simple Wordpress plugin that does all the On-Page SEO, and automatically for you? That's right AUTOMATICALLY, just watch this 4minute video for more information at. Seo Plugin seo http://www.SeoOptimizationTipz.com/ <!--more--> AUTHOR: seo AUTHOR EMAIL: zffsuiq@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Subject Line to Email Here IP: 170.130.25.163 Array ( [Name] => seo [Email] => zffsuiq@gmail.com [Comment] => Hello Web Admin, I noticed that your On-Page SEO is is missing a few factors, for one you do not use all three H tags in your post, also I notice that you are not using bold or italics properly in your SEO optimization. On-Page SEO means more now than ever since the new Google update: Panda. No longer are backlinks and simply pinging or sending out a RSS feed the key to getting Google PageRank or Alexa Rankings, You now NEED On-Page SEO. So what is good On-Page SEO?First your keyword must appear in the title.Then it must appear in the URL.You have to optimize your keyword and make sure that it has a nice keyword density of 3-5% in your article with relevant LSI (Latent Semantic Indexing). Then you should spread all H1,H2,H3 tags in your article.Your Keyword should appear in your first paragraph and in the last sentence of the page. You should have relevant usage of Bold and italics of your keyword.There should be one internal link to a page on your blog and you should have one image with an alt tag that has your keyword....wait there's even more Now what if i told you there was a simple Wordpress plugin that does all the On-Page SEO, and automatically for you? That's right AUTOMATICALLY, just watch this 4minute video for more information at. Seo Plugin seo http://www.SeoOptimizationTipz.com/ )

Hello, my name is Morty Goldman; I just stumbled upon your site - themes.truethemes.net - I'm sorry to write in such an odd manner, I thought to call you but I didn't want to take up your time. What I have to say may be of great interest to you. Did you know that an overwhelming majority of businesses, organizations and celebrities buy likes and followers? What, you thought your competitor's likes and followers are organic and naturally gained? Ha ha. Just recently Gangman Style ( http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bZkp7q19f0 ) reached a record 2 billion views. Now imagine the scale of Gangnam Style's popularity being applied to your business! This is exactly how I deliver results to my clients - and I assure you that you'll be overwhelmingly pleased with the outcome.

item.title: Devin - 2015-02-02 01:12:14
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
My name is Devin Sorbert - I'm a media manager at Social Media Gurus. We're a 3 person full social media management company based out of Greater Grand Rapids, Michigan. We handle account creation and growth for small businesses - and our 3rd partner has spent 3 years setting up Facebook and Google Adwords campaigns for small businesses for local lead generation for a Grand Rapids media management company before coming to work with us.
I saw themes.truethemes.net and want to know if you're interested in expanding your social media presence? Basically - more fans, likes and general engagement on your Facebook page?
It's really easy - we'd do a free 15 minute consultation over phone or Skype - where we'll fill out a simple questionnaire to figure out the specific social media needs for your business. I'll show you some references and current clients pages that have consented to being used as examples (pet shelters and such) - and explain why more fans and activity on your page will help your business. If during the consultation we learn that you sell commercially/are happy with 10 fans on your page/have no business use for social media presence - I won't sell you garbage. Chemical factories don't need Facebook pages (unless they'd like a corporate page) - and I won't argue with that.
Our prices start at $189 a month for complete management and assistance of your media profile. Our prices reflect the service quality - if you've had bad experiences buying fans for $20 on Fiverr that were deleted/had your account suspended - we can rectify that. We run small media campaigns throughout the month creating natural fan growth to your page - no automated accounts or likes, and no chance of any account issues. We also do not need any security information to promote your page - anyone who does probably uses a form of automation to grow your account.
Check out these monthly plans to get a full idea of everything we do for your page and then send me a reply for your consultation :) http://socialmediagurus.net/
If I can help you - reply back at emailsocialmediagurus@mail.com and we'll set up a good time for you to create a plan for themes.truethemes.net.
Hope I can assist you, Devin <!--more--> AUTHOR: Devin AUTHOR EMAIL: understoodyacht3c@rediffmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Subject Line to Email Here IP: 178.137.85.199 Array ( [Name] => Devin [Email] => understoodyacht3c@rediffmail.com [Website] => [Comment] => Hello,

If during the consultation we learn that you sell commercially/are happy with 10 fans on your page/have no business use for social media presence - I won't sell you garbage. Chemical factories don't need Facebook pages (unless they'd like a corporate page) - and I won't argue with that.

item.title: Let us gain you new clients and sales Via social media for FREE - 2016-01-24 08:55:52
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Hello I was browsing your site and noticed you could use some help with your social media marketing. I understand its hard to keep on top of social media and that leads to frustration but also leaves a lot of money on the table when you give up on it too soon! i would like to offer you a 10 day FREE trial of our social marketing services. We focus on Facebook as a base - but we also work with all of the 5 big platforms out there like Twitter, Instagram and Pinterest. item.title: Donna - 2016-05-02 16:41:13
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Hello, I tried calling you several times today, and I'm not getting through for some reason. If your website does not have many Facebook Likes, why would someone visit your Facebook Fanpage? People Like you when other people like you. The more people that LIKE your website and fanpage on Facebook, the more credibility you will have with new visitors. It works the same for Twitter, Instagram and Youtube. When people visit your page and see that you have a lot of followers, they now want to follow you too. They too want to know what all the hype is and why all those people are following you. Get some free likes, followers, and views just for trying this service I found: http://yxbp.com/87dm <!--more--> AUTHOR: Donna AUTHOR EMAIL: huhbttuy@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: http://mariowelte.de/6y5j SUBJECT: Subject Line to Email Here IP: 45.40.33.91 Array ( [Name] => Donna [Email] => huhbttuy@gmail.com [Website] => http://mariowelte.de/6y5j [Comment] => Hello, I tried calling you several times today, and I'm not getting through for some reason. If your website does not have many Facebook Likes, why would someone visit your Facebook Fanpage? People Like you when other people like you. The more people that LIKE your website and fanpage on Facebook, the more credibility you will have with new visitors. It works the same for Twitter, Instagram and Youtube. When people visit your page and see that you have a lot of followers, they now want to follow you too. They too want to know what all the hype is and why all those people are following you. Get some free likes, followers, and views just for trying this service I found: http://yxbp.com/87dm )

item.content:encoded: Did you just create your new Facebook page? Do you want your page to look a little more "established"? I found a service that can help you with that. item.title: I waa just reading a review about your business.. - 2016-06-18 00:31:42
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Hey, Did you know 92% of people read online reviews before selecting a business or service? item.title: Complimentary tool to take control of your social media. - 2016-06-28 06:03:22
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Hi there I wanted to reach out to you today about your social media. I noticed your campaigns are a bit up and down and thought you would benefit quite a bit from our new social dashboard tool that lets you manage all your social profiles and pages such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and Pinterest all from one online system. Best of all its complimentary! No charge at all. You already know that social media is a very effective way for you and your business to generate new leads, and with our social dashboard you can simplify your efforts by spending just a bit of time in our dashboard to schedule out an entire week, 2 weeks or even a month of posts and content ahead of time. Wouldn't that be a relief? Register for your complimentary access now at http://www.mysocialbutler.org Have a great day! Gina MSB Outreach <!--more--> AUTHOR: Complimentary tool to take control of your social media. item.title: Business Review update - 2016-06-28 23:22:11
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Hi there Would you like to easily see a birds eye view of what your current and past customers think about you? Do you know what people are saying about you? Whether its hurting or helping your business? My name is Paul, the Outreach Director of Five Star Fast Lane, and for the price of, well, nothing --I would like to provide you with a full detailed report on your current business standings. As a bonus, our report scanner will report back with any inaccuracies about your business that are out there potentially causing you loss of revenue and customers. There is no obligation or a catch, the report is yours to use as you see fit. Feel free to make use of it at http://www.fivestarfastlane.info Regards Paul Five Star Fast Lane PS - If you want to discuss the results we are available via live chat daily on the site. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Business Review update AUTHOR EMAIL: Paul@5starrep.com AUTHOR URL: http://www.fivestarfastlane.info SUBJECT: Subject Line to Email Here IP: 192.154.208.121 Array ( [Name] => Business Review update [Email] => Paul@5starrep.com [Website] => http://www.fivestarfastlane.info [Comment] => Hi there Would you like to easily see a birds eye view of what your current and past customers think about you? There is no obligation or a catch, the report is yours to use as you see fit. item.title: Hey i just saw your video on Google - 2016-06-30 23:06:29
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Hey There, thanks for taking the time to read my email i just want to share with you this quick video showing you how i am ranking video after video on the first page of google! Look i know you get message after message from people telling you how they can get you first page rankings, well in this video i show you that i WALK THE WALk! All i ask is you give me 2 mins of your time so i can show you how i rank Videos on the front page of Google and how i can do the same for you bringing in clientssales in days! http://www.freshclients4u.com (this will take you to my private blog) enjoy the video and get ready to have your socks blown off! enjoy! item.content:encoded: Hi, our FREE trial... we know that you get mailed everyday with offers so I will keep this short... we want to offer you a free trial of our service.. here is what we do 1. We Make you social media accounts on all the big networks 2. We find your target market, if your a local business then this will be people that live in your catchment area, if you sell a product then this will be people that have a PROVEN interest in your goods or service 3. we then get these people to follow or like your account so they will get your contentoffersupdates 4. we then post content to get people people buzzing about your latest offer or sale 5. all your followers will be TARGETED people this of course will leads to sales! Get more info, your free trial and dedicated account manger who will make sure you get new followsleads and sales.. let us prove we are the real deal jump on for free! Looking forward to showing you what we can do. Whether you're a Wordpress pro or just a beginner you'll have absolutely no problems at all working with this theme.[/karma_callout_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-landscape.png"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-living-room.png"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-office.png"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-gorgeous-view.png"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][heading_horizontal type="h6" margin_bottom="35px"]Our Clients Say it Best[/heading_horizontal][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][testimonial_wrap animate="animate_none"][testimonial client_name="Happy Customer"]We are so AMAZED by the exceptional skills and professionalism that TrueThemes has showed our law firm. Their excellent support, fast ticket response and vision into design is top notch! We love this Karma theme and we’re so happy with the incredible assistance we’ve received from TrueThemes! Keep up the great work guys!! And Thank you![/testimonial][testimonial client_name="Customer #2"]I have downloaded 8 themes from themeforest. This has been the easiest to customize out of them all. I’ve never turned a website around so fast! I’ll be looking for more themes from TrueThemes in the future. Thanks![/testimonial][testimonial client_name="Janet, Happy Customer"]I have purchased the Karma Theme and can completely recommend it. The training videos are wonderful, very clear and concise with detailed instructions and demonstration. The Technical Support has also been wonderful, the response time on a issue I had was phenomenal, plus the solution to my issue was provided in a very clear manner. I will be using Karma on my next project as well.[/testimonial][/testimonial_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" parallax="content-moving-fade" css=".vc_custom_1463021085853{padding-top: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 15% !important;background-image: url(http://localhost/MAMP-Local/karma/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2015/07/karma-features-main-bg.jpg?id=10308) !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="10309" img_size="full" alignment="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1482965318437{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#86b946"]

Visual Composer

#1 Drag & Drop Page Builder Plugin for WordPress - included free!

[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#5599d1"]

Karma Page Builder

Our most powerful extension for visual composer - comes with 100+ elements.

[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#7bb3ba"]

Automatic Updates

Karma + Karma Builder now update seamlessly right inside the WP Dashboard.

[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1435947785231{padding-top: 16% !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 16% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}" el_class="karma-feature-builder"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text] Our most powerful extension for Visual Composer. You get premium page builder elements with literally 1000's of combination options. Plus, automatic plugin updates served right to your dashboard. Animated Lists Buttons Circle Loaders Image Boxes Progress Bars Tabs Testimonials & many more [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9 vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs"][vc_single_image image="10312" img_size="full"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1435784303806{padding-top: 11% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column][karma_builder_heading animate="animate_none" heading_text="More Features" heading_color="#86b946" sub_heading_color="#555555" heading_size="44px" heading_type="h3" heading_style="none"]Additional premium features built standard into the Karma theme[/karma_builder_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1435940458560{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-right: 11% !important;padding-bottom: 11% !important;padding-left: 11% !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12" css=".vc_custom_1435940643788{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#86b946" paragraph_font_size="13px" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Automatic Updates
Seamless 1-click Automatic Updates for Karma and Karma-Builder right in the WP Dashboard.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#ff6138" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
SEO Module
Optimize every page with All-in-one SEO built right into the theme. Also fully compatible with 3rd-party plugins.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#97beba" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Dedicated Support
Timely ticket responses and extensive array of self-help resources. Experience a whole new level of customer support.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#9c5d90" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Extensive Admin Options
Customize nearly every aspect of your website from our powerful and easy-to-use admin options panel.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#00a388" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Actively Maintained
Karma is our flagship product with over 30 major releases since its original release. We love serving you awesome updates.[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12" css=".vc_custom_1435940734497{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#9c5d90" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
WooCommerce Support
Fully integrated with WooCommerce shopping cart. Setting up an online shop is an absolute breeze.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#79bd8f" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Form Builder
Build powerful forms with Karma's point-and-click form builder. Also fully compatible with GravityForms and Contact Form 7.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#86b946" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
HD Training Videos
High definition training videos with step-by-step instructions for successfully using every aspect of Karma.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#5599d1" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
WPML Compatible
Thoroughly tested and certified with WPML Plugin. Translate the theme into any language you wish.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#3e879e" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Optimized Code
Clean and optimized code written to today's latest web standards. Fully optimized HTML5 and CSS3.[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12" css=".vc_custom_1435940790426{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#5599d1" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Responsive Design
Karma is 100% responsive and will adapt to fit all devices. Plus Bootstrap framework via Visual Composer.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#00a388" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Accessibility Compliant
We teamed up with an accessibility expert to ensure that your Karma site can reach the widest audience possible.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#296b73" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Developer Friendly
Action Hooks, Well-Commented Code, Wordpress Codex Compliant. Karma theme has got your back.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#f07c6c" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Revolution Slider
Revolution Slider Plugin included completely free. A robust plugin for creating absolutely stunning animated sliders.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#7fc6bc" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Page Building
Drag-and-drop page building with Visual Composer and Karma Builder, all yours completely free.[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12" css=".vc_custom_1435940997490{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;}"][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#ff3400" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
LayerSlider
LayerSlider Plugin included completely free. Create mind-blowing slideshows with must-see effects.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#f07c6c" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Child Theme
Karma Child Theme included free with your purchase. Make massive coding changes and never lose a thing.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#3e8c84" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
RTL Support
Karma fully supports Right-to-Left languages right out of the box. Hebrew, Persian, Arabic and more.[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#7ab2b9" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
Plugin Compatible
Karma is built to all of the latest WordPress codex coding standards to ensure that premium plugins will work brilliantly with your theme[/karma_builder_icon_content][karma_builder_icon_content animate="animate_none" type="fontawesome" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-check" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_bg_color="#db6c0f" custom_css_class="karma-feature-list-item"]
100+ Elements
Choose from 100's of uniquely designed pixel-perfect page elements perfect for every web project.[/karma_builder_icon_content][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[one_third] [tt_vector_box icon="fa-calendar" size="fa-4x" color="#7D60A9" link_to_page="" target="" description=""]

Whether you're a Wordpress pro or just a beginner you'll have absolutely no problems at all working with this theme.[/karma_callout_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-landscape.png"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-living-room.png"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-office.png"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][frame animate="animate_none" style="modern" size="four_col_large" float="none" external_image_url="http://s3.truethemes.net/theme-xml-content/wp-karma-4/4-column/4-column-gorgeous-view.png"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][heading_horizontal type="h6" margin_bottom="35px"]Our Clients Say it Best[/heading_horizontal][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][testimonial_wrap animate="animate_none"][testimonial client_name="Happy Customer"]We are so AMAZED by the exceptional skills and professionalism that TrueThemes has showed our law firm. Their excellent support, fast ticket response and vision into design is top notch! We love this Karma theme and we’re so happy with the incredible assistance we’ve received from TrueThemes! Keep up the great work guys!! And Thank you![/testimonial][testimonial client_name="Customer #2"]I have downloaded 8 themes from themeforest. This has been the easiest to customize out of them all. I’ve never turned a website around so fast! I’ll be looking for more themes from TrueThemes in the future. Thanks![/testimonial][testimonial client_name="Janet, Happy Customer"]I have purchased the Karma Theme and can completely recommend it. The training videos are wonderful, very clear and concise with detailed instructions and demonstration. The Technical Support has also been wonderful, the response time on a issue I had was phenomenal, plus the solution to my issue was provided in a very clear manner. I will be using Karma on my next project as well.[/testimonial][/testimonial_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
